item.title: 驶往古巴油轮载俄燃料将测试特朗普封锁令
item.description: 一艘据信载有俄罗斯燃料的船只正驶往古巴，在该岛能源危机日益加剧之际，此举将考验美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的制裁措施。【原文：A ship believed to be carrying Russian fuels is on its way to Cuba, putting US President Donald Trump’s sanctions to the test amid the island’s deepening energy crisis.】

item.title: 关税震荡与人工智能席卷华尔街之际，聪明资金正赢得胜利
item.description: 喧嚣动荡的华尔街正上演着多年指数被动持有策略罕见的情景：让聪明资金再度显得明智。【原文：A noisy, unsettled Wall Street is doing what years of simply owning the index rarely has: made the smart money look smart again.】

item.title: 页岩钻井商扩大能源业务，交易商关注俄亥俄州工厂
item.description: Expand Energy Corp.股价创下一个月来最大涨幅，成为周五标普500指数中表现最亮眼的个股之一。市场预期这家页岩油气开采商将受益于俄亥俄州计划新建的巨型天然气发电厂。【原文：Expand Energy Corp. rose the most in a month, making it one of Friday’s best performers in the S&P 500, on expectations the shale driller will benefit from a giant new natural gas-fired power plant planned in Ohio.】

item.title: 基石建筑贷款机构在与业主会谈前签署协议
item.description: 知情人士透露，Cornerstone Building Brands Inc.的一批债权人计划在与私募股权所有者Clayton Dubilier & Rice的预期谈判前进行协调，旨在增强该集团的谈判筹码，因该公司业绩持续疲软。【原文：A bloc of creditors of Cornerstone Building Brands Inc. plans to coordinate ahead of expected talks with its private equity owner Clayton Dubilier & Rice, aiming to increase the group’s leverage as the company’s performance weakens, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 据称米达斯汽车维修公司老板梅维斯轮胎将选择银行进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，旗下拥有米德斯（Midas）和塔菲（Tuffy）等品牌的汽车维修与轮胎服务提供商美维斯轮胎快修服务公司（Mavis Tire Express Services Corp.）已选定承销银行，计划在美国首次公开募股。【原文：Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, has picked banks for a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普将公开UFO档案。不知怎的，竟为此推出了ETF基金。
item.description: 塔特尔资本UFO披露ETF投资于前瞻性技术【原文：The Tuttle Capital UFO Disclosure ETF invests in forward-thinking technology】

item.title: 微软任命夏尔马执掌Xbox业务，重申对游戏主机业务的承诺
item.description: 微软公司任命人工智能高管阿莎·夏尔马接替菲尔·斯宾塞，领导其Xbox和游戏业务部门。在多年专注于移动端和PC端产品开发后，该公司将重新致力于服务主机游戏用户。【原文：Microsoft Corp. named AI executive Asha Sharma to lead its Xbox and gaming business, replacing Phil Spencer, and will recommit to console users after years of developing products for mobile and PC players.】

item.title: 刚果央行将购入国有企业黄金充实储备
item.description: 刚果民主共和国央行将开始从一家国有贸易商处购买黄金充实其货币储备，该公司周五宣布。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s central bank will begin purchasing gold for its monetary reserves from a state-owned trader, the company announced Friday.】

item.title: 贝森特称关税收入在2026年将"基本保持不变"
item.description: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特表示，尽管最高法院周五作出裁决，但由于特朗普总统正动用其他授权征收关税，2026年关税收入将"基本保持不变"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that revenue collected from tariffs will be “virtually unchanged” in 2026, despite Friday’s Supreme Court ruling, as President Donald Trump uses alternate authorities to impose duties.】

item.title: 萨巴与考克斯宣布对蓝猫BDC股份发起要约收购
item.description: 萨巴资本管理公司与考克斯资本合伙公司宣布，将对蓝猫资本公司持有的商业发展公司股份发起现金要约收购。【原文：Saba Capital Management and Cox Capital Partners have announced cash tender offers for shares in business development companies owned by Blue Owl Capital Corporation.】

item.title: 亚马逊称黑客利用人工智能数周内攻破600道防火墙
item.description: 亚马逊公司的一项安全研究显示，过去五周内，一小部分黑客借助广泛可得的人工智能工具，入侵了数十个国家超过600个防火墙系统。【原文：Over the last five weeks, a limited number of hackers broke into more than 600 firewalls across dozens of countries with the help of widely available artificial intelligence tools, according to security research from Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称涉及AppLovin的调查"仍在进行中"
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五表示，针对移动广告技术公司AppLovin的调查"仍在进行中"。【原文：A Securities and Exchange Commission probe involving mobile advertising technology company AppLovin Corp. is “still active and ongoing,” the regulator said Friday.】

item.title: 康菲石油考虑出售价值20亿美元的二叠纪盆地资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，康菲石油正考虑出售其部分二叠纪盆地资产，作为其资产组合更广泛精简计划的一部分。【原文：ConocoPhillips is exploring a sale of some of its Permian Basin assets as part of a broader streamlining of its portfolio, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利国家铜业公司称旗舰矿山事故后数年内无增长
item.description: 智利国家铜业公司预计，其最大铜矿的产量将在未来数年维持在当前较低水平，这家国有企业正努力应对智利数十年来最严重矿难造成的持续影响。【原文：Codelco expects output at its biggest copper mine to be stuck around current reduced levels for several years as the state-owned company grapples with the widening fallout from Chile’s deadliest mine accident in decades.】

item.title: 巴拉圭降息至5.5%，预计2026年大部分时间通胀率将保持低位
item.description: 巴拉圭将借贷成本下调0.25个百分点至5.50%，政策制定者表示预计今年大部分时间通胀率将低于目标水平。【原文：Paraguay lowered borrowing costs by a quarter of a percentage point to 5.50%, with policymakers saying they expect inflation to remain below target most of the year.】

item.title: 人工智能公司Anthropic推出"Claude代码安全"功能，科技股应声下跌
item.description: 周五，网络安全软件公司股价暴跌，此前Anthropic PBC在其Claude人工智能模型中引入了一项新安全功能。【原文：Shares of cybersecurity software companies tumbled Friday after Anthropic PBC introduced a new security feature into its Claude AI model.】

item.title: 摩根大通将通过50亿美元债务交易测试市场对软件的需求
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由摩根大通公司牵头的贷款方集团正准备筹集53亿美元债务，以支持Qualtrics International Inc.收购医疗保健调查公司Press Ganey Forsta。【原文：A lender group led by JPMorgan Chase & Co. is preparing to raise $5.3 billion of debt to support Qualtrics International Inc.’s purchase of health-care survey firm Press Ganey Forsta, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 一款华丽的电子游戏，也充满犹太风情
item.description: 《高盛的永生》是罕见以犹太裔角色为主角的电子游戏【原文：The ‘Eternal Life of Goldman’ is the rare video game to feature a distinctly Jewish protagonist】

item.title: 加州拨款5.9亿美元维持湾区公共交通运行
item.description: 加州州长加文·纽森签署立法，授权该州向旧金山周边主要公共交通运营商提供5.9亿美元贷款，以维持其运营。疫情后出行模式的变化持续给这些运营商的财务状况带来压力。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom signed legislation authorizing the state to lend $590 million to keep major public-transit operators around San Francisco running as post-pandemic travel patterns continue to strain their finances.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局资源不足以监管美联航的安全风险
item.description: 美国政府监督机构指出，美国联邦航空管理局对联合航空控股公司维修操作的监管存在资源不足的问题，这意味着某些安全风险依然存在。【原文：The US Federal Aviation Administration’s oversight of United Airlines Holdings Inc.’s maintenance practices suffers from a lack of resources, meaning some safety risks remain, a government watchdog said.】

item.title: 玻利维亚钢铁制造商考虑从中国贷款中扣除工厂亏损
item.description: 玻利维亚国有钢铁公司正与建造其旗舰工厂的中国工程公司发生纠纷，并表示可能寻求从偿还贷款方中国进出口银行的款项中扣除部分1亿美元的损失。【原文：Bolivia’s state steel company is feuding with the Chinese engineering firm that built its flagship plant, and says it may seek to deduct some of the $100 million in losses from repayments to its lender, the Export-Import Bank of China.】

item.title: 加拿大最大银行正寻求更高回报
item.description: 此外：最高法院裁定特朗普部分关税措施违宪【原文：Also: SCOTUS rules against (some of) Trump’s tariffs】

item.title: 特朗普将在法院关税裁决后举行记者会
item.description: 在最高法院推翻特朗普总统第二任期内实施的大部分全球性关税政策后，特朗普将举行新闻发布会。此举对其标志性经济政策造成重大打击。【原文：President Donald Trump will hold a press briefing after the Supreme Court struck down the bulk of the sweeping global tariffs he’s implemented in his second term, delivering a major blow against his signature economic policy.】

item.title: 欧盟立法者在关税裁决后召开会议讨论美欧贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟立法者将于周一召开紧急会议，重新评估该集团与美国的贸易协议。此前美国最高法院裁定推翻了特朗普总统部分全球性关税措施。【原文：European Union lawmakers will hold an emergency meeting Monday to reassess the bloc’s trade deal with the US following the Supreme Court’s decision to strike down some of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰打造新型私人信贷避风港
item.description: 更多循环融资。【原文：More circular financing.】

item.title: 关于最高法院裁定特朗普关税案的要点说明
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普援引1977年《紧急状态法》中所谓几乎不受限制的关税征收权，采取了史无前例的行动。如今，最高法院裁定此举同样违法。【原文：In invoking what he claimed were virtually unlimited powers to impose tariffs under a 1977 emergency law, US President Donald Trump took unprecedented action. Now, the Supreme Court has determined that it was illegal, too.】

item.title: 美国以安全为由限制向智利官员发放签证
item.description: 美国国务院周五表示，因涉嫌破坏地区安全，美国已对三名未具名的智利政府官员实施签证限制。【原文：The US has imposed visa restrictions on three unnamed Chilean government officials for allegedly undermining regional security, the State Department said Friday.】

item.title: 阿波罗的桑伯尔预见私募股权将面临长期软件困境
item.description: 据阿波罗全球管理公司一位高管透露，私募股权公司正面临软件领域的重大考验，此前它们未能察觉人工智能等技术将颠覆私募股权最青睐的行业之一。【原文：Buyout firms are on the brink of a software reckoning, having failed to spot signs that technologies like artificial intelligence would upend one of private equity’s favorite sectors, according to one of Apollo Global Management Inc.’s top executives.】
